sentences.en: 'I thought we'd always been at war with Eurasia,'she said vaguely.
sentences.cn: “ 我还当我们一直跟欧亚国打仗哩, ” 她含含糊糊地说.

sentences.en: An annual grass ( Panicum milaiceum ) cultivated in Eurasia for its grains and in North America for hay.
sentences.cn: 黍,稷,粟在欧亚广泛栽培以收获其谷物,在北美洲种植以获取桔杆的一年生植物 ( 稷稷属 )

sentences.en: Armenia is a land - locked country located in Eurasia's Southern Caucasus mountain range.
sentences.cn: 亚美尼亚是位于欧亚大陆南高加索山脉的内陆国.

sentences.en: As analyzing China mainland horizontal displacement ( movement ) field, the reference is relative to Eurasia plate generally.
sentences.cn: 通常分析中国大陆水平位移 ( 运动 ) 场所采用的参考基准均是相对于欧亚板块的.

sentences.en: At 300 mb , zonal mean temperature averaged over Eurasia along 20� � - 25� � N decreased sharply around 23 August.
sentences.cn: 在300mb上,大约8月23日欧亚地区沿20°—25°N平均的纬向平均温度急剧地减小.

sentences.en: At 300 mb, zonal mean temperature averaged over Eurasia along 20 - 25 N decreased sharply around 23 August.
sentences.cn: 在300mb上, 大约8月23日欧亚地区沿20—25N平均的纬向平均温度急剧地减小.

sentences.en: Eurasia ; northern North America to Virginia.
sentences.cn: 分布于欧亚大陆; 分布在北美洲至弗吉尼亚一带.

sentences.en: Eurasia except southern Russia; northern North America.
sentences.cn: 分布在除俄国南部以外的欧亚地区; 北美洲北部.

sentences.en: Foreigners, whether from Eurasia or from Eastasia, were a kind of strange animal.
sentences.cn: 外国人, 欧亚国人也罢, 东亚国人也罢,不过是些个怪兮兮的动物.

sentences.en: I first came to North American in prehistoric times when I crossed the Bering Strait land bridge from Eurasia.
sentences.cn: 在史前时期，我从欧亚大陆穿越白令海峡、走过陆地、桥第一次来到了北美。

sentences.en: Many geographers now call this landmass Eurasia.
sentences.cn: 许多地理学家现在把这块陆地叫作欧亚大陆.

sentences.en: Oceania was at war with Eurasia: therefore Oceania had always been at war with Eurasia.
sentences.cn: 大洋国在跟欧亚国打仗,由此推之,它也便一直在跟欧亚国打仗.

sentences.en: Our company handles famous - Brand suits of Eurasia, which are excellent in workmanship and elegant in style.
sentences.cn: 本公司销售欧亚名牌西装, 做工精良,格调高雅.

sentences.en: The lake is the largest spawning ground for red salmon in Eurasia and the best place for bears.
sentences.cn: 这个湖泊是欧亚大陆上最大的，红三文鱼的产卵场所。 也是野熊最爱呆的地方。

sentences.en: Three powers are emerging on the periphery of Eurasia.
sentences.cn: 在欧亚大陆周缘地带将出现三大势力。
不是还有欧亚国和东亚国 吗 ?
